title: Quality growth policy
context: ยง223-2 Quality growth policy. The office of planning shall develop a quality growth policy based upon the following considerations: (1) An examination of the environmental impact of proposed urban development; (2) The relationship between short-term and long-term environmental quality; (3) Any irretrievable commitment of resources through urban development; and (4) Alternatives available to minimize adverse environmental effects as balanced against economic development of the State. The quality growth policy shall include a comprehensive policy framework for directing growth and land use and shall identify State growth objectives and specific operational constraints to further such objectives.
